product.title: Scamp to the Rescue | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Scamp to the Rescue

Inspired by the acclaimed Disney animated film, Lady and the Tramp, this fetching reprise centers around the adventures of the happy couple’s pups. Scamp, the most boisterous puppy of the litter, is often scolded for his mischievous behavior. However, when his brothers and sisters are dognapped, Scamp musters his courage and uses his wits to ensure their safe return. Though courage and the bond of family are prevalent themes, this book also demonstrates to young readers that anyone is capable of becoming an everyday hero.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list the characteristics of a hero, such as bravery, nobility, and selflessness. Cite examples of everyday heroes in your neighborhood.
